const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-dfs-index",
  settings: {
    number_of_shards: 2,
    number_of_replicas: 1,
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      "my-keyword": {
        type: "keyword",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.bulk({
  index: "my-dfs-index",
  refresh: "true",
  operations: [
    {
      index: {
        _id: "1",
      },
    },
    {
      "my-keyword": "a",
    },
    {
      index: {
        _id: "2",
      },
    },
    {
      "my-keyword": "b",
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response1);
